question_stem.en: A 65-year-old man comes to the office due to bothersome tremors. The patient was diagnosed with idiopathic Parkinson disease 10 years ago and has since been successfully treated with levodopa-carbidopa. However, over the last several months, he has developed frequent freezing episodes characterized by a sudden loss of mobility. More recently, the patient's tremors worsened after he reduced his levodopa dose following the development of involuntary body movements. On examination, he has a bilateral resting tremor that is worse on the right, bradykinesia, and cogwheel rigidity. His symptoms have significantly degraded his quality of life, and he is now interested in discussing surgical options. This patient would benefit most from a treatment targeted at suppressing neuronal activity in which of the following brain structures?
question_stem.zh: 一名65岁的男性因烦人的震颤前来就诊。患者10年前被诊断为特发性帕金森病，此后一直使用左旋多巴-卡比多巴成功治疗。然而，在过去的几个月里，他出现了频繁的冻结发作，其特征是突然丧失活动能力。最近，在出现不自主的身体运动后，患者在减少左旋多巴剂量后震颤加重。体格检查显示，他有双侧静止性震颤，右侧较重，运动迟缓和齿轮样强直。他的症状严重降低了他的生活质量，他现在有兴趣讨论手术方案。该患者将从针对抑制以下哪个脑结构中的神经元活动的治疗中获益最大？

question.en: This patient would benefit most from a treatment targeted at suppressing neuronal activity in which of the following brain structures?
question.zh: 该患者将从针对抑制以下哪个脑结构中的神经元活动的治疗中获益最大？

E.en: Ventral intermediate nucleus of the thalamus

summary.en:
This question tests knowledge of the pathophysiology of Parkinson's disease and the rationale for surgical interventions targeting specific brain structures within the basal ganglia circuitry. It assesses understanding of how deep brain stimulation or lesioning of the subthalamic nucleus (STN) or globus pallidus interna (GPi) can alleviate motor symptoms in advanced Parkinson's disease.

To solve this question, recall the role of the STN in the indirect pathway of the basal ganglia and its overactivity in Parkinson's disease due to dopamine deficiency. Recognize that suppressing STN activity reduces GPi output, disinhibiting the thalamus and improving motor function. Eliminate options that would worsen symptoms or target unrelated brain regions.
summary.zh:
这个问题测试了对帕金森病病理生理学的了解，以及针对基底神经节回路中特定脑结构的外科干预的原理。它评估了对深部脑刺激或丘脑底核（STN）或苍白球内侧部（GPi）的病灶切除术如何减轻晚期帕金森病的运动症状的理解。

要解决这个问题，请回忆STN在基底神经节间接通路中的作用，以及由于多巴胺缺乏导致其在帕金森病中的过度活动。认识到抑制STN的活动可以减少GPi的输出，解除丘脑的抑制并改善运动功能。排除会加重症状或针对不相关脑区域的选项。
